subject: Re: Lanna Rehab
preview: Hi William, Just confirming that the geo location is fixed on https://alcoholrehab.com and the revised contact form setup is also done on https://dararehab.com/ : )

full_threads.body:
Hi William, 

Just confirming that the geo location is fixed on https://alcoholrehab.com and the revised contact form setup is also done on https://dararehab.com/ : )
@joel can you please do this one too? Cheers

Hi William, 

Ok great thanks!! We should have that ready mid-afternoon. 

We will let you know once it's ready.

Hi Heath,

I've just spoken to the client. They are happy to replace the form on the bottom with a CTA button "Enquire Now" which will then take people to the Contact Us page.

Thanks heaps mate!!!

Kind Regards,



William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager

P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320

50 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi William, 

I thought I would get this down in an email whilst it's fresh in my mind. 

The Captcha issue is a known bug to both Captcha and Ninja Forms. There isn't really a way around it at present. 

What I'm thinking we can do is:

  1. Leave the form in the sidebar as is. 
  2. Add a big button to replace the form at the bottom of the page, something like, 'CLICK HERE TO SEND US A MESSAGE
  3. When the button is clicked it takes the to the contact us page with from inc Captcha 

I understand it's an extra click, but there is currently a form in the sidebar + multiple contact points (All of the phone numbers), so I think this could be the best solution, all things considered. Let me know what you think?
@heath This going to be tricky, the 2 forms are the same. So we are basically calling same forms on  the same page. I'll have to research this one.

action.text: Heath Maguire changed the customer to William Yap

full_threads.body:
@joel on the blog pages, the same form is setup to appear twice, one in the side bar and one down near the footer. It has a Captcha and it's only displaying once on the page (in the sidebar form). The client wants it to display on both forms. Here is a sample link: https://dararehab.com/blog/new-zealand-drug-market-meth-cocaine-striving/

I searched the error from the console log, and there seem to be some solutions floating around. I'm just not sure which approach to take. Can you please look into it? Cheers !!

Hi William,

Sure, it looks like a bug with Ninja Forms.

The form in the footer at the bottom of the page was previously a CF7 one, we changed it to the Ninja Forms one as requested earlier. Now that it’s a Ninja Form, the two captcha’s are technically serving the same purpose of protecting the same form... so they are conflicting with each other.

We will try and create a work around for you. Leave it with me.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


<https://wpperk.com/>
